report_data.Post or Account Link: Civilians who still believe in the new government are no better than the killers themselves. They stand with the enemy, they deserve the same fate. Stop wasting sympathy on them — they made their choice. We have to cleanse our land of those who welcomed the oppressors. No forgiveness, no exceptions.

classification:
The classification of this post is:

Call for Violence**

This post promotes violence and hatred towards civilians who support the new government, stating that they "no better than the killers themselves" and "deserve the same fate". The language used is incendiary and encourages violence against a specific group of people, making it a call for violence.
